```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(flexdashboard) # libraries for controlling current rendering
source("./Common/jirametrics.R")
fileName <- params$data
# fileName <- "./Datasets/Opics.dat"
df <- readDataset(fileName)
tib <- df %>% 
      as_tibble() %>%
      mutate(crdt = toDate(Created),
             updt = toDate(Updated),
             cldt = toDate(Closed),
             cylt = as.numeric(getAge(crdt, cldt))
      ) %>%
     filter(cldt >= as.Date(params$date_from))
```


Features (Interactive)
===========================================

Column {data-width=600}
-------------------------------------------

### Feature Cycle Time

```{r epics_with_plotly, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
color_point <- c(finastra_cols("crimson"),
                 finastra_cols("orange"),
                 finastra_cols("fuchsia"),
                 finastra_cols("blue")
                )
epics <- tib %>% filter(! is.na(Closed)) %>% 
                 filter(Type == "Epic")

cldt <- epics$cldt
cylt <- epics$cylt

sp.base = smooth.spline(cylt, cldt)

line.fmt.rmean5 <- list(dash="dash", width = 2, colors=finastra_cols("crimson"))
line.fmt.linear <- list(dash="solid", width = 2, colors=finastra_cols("crimson"))

m1 <- lm(cldt ~ cylt)
rmean5 = stats::filter(cylt, rep(1/5, 5), side=2)

epics_cycle_time_plot <- plot_ly(data = epics, 
                                 x = ~cldt, 
                                 y = ~cylt)

# epics_cycle_time_plot <- add_lines(epics_cycle_time_plot, x = cldt,
#                                    y = predict(m1),
#                                    line = line.fmt.linear, name = "Linear")

epics_cycle_time_plot <- add_lines(epics_cycle_time_plot, x = cldt,
                                     y = rmean5,
                                     line = line.fmt.rmean5, 
                                     name = "Running Mean (Bandwidth = 5)",
                                     colors = "Accent"
                                   )

epics_cycle_time_plot <- add_trace(epics_cycle_time_plot, 
                                     type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
                                     color = ~Priority,
                                     colors = "Accent"
                                   )


epics_cycle_time_plot <-  epics_cycle_time_plot %>%
  layout(
    title = "Epics Cycle Time",
    xaxis = list(title =
                   "Dates"),
    yaxis = list(title =
                   "Cycle Times")
  ) 

epics_cycle_time_plot
                  
                 

```

Features
===========================================

Column {data-width=600}
-------------------------------------------

### Feature Cycle Time
```{r epics, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
color_point <- c(finastra_cols("crimson"),
                 finastra_cols("orange"),
                 finastra_cols("fuchsia"),
                 finastra_cols("blue")
                 )
epics <- tib %>% filter(! is.na(Closed)) %>% 
                 filter(Type == "Epic")
                 
ggplot(epics, aes(x=cldt, y=cylt)) +
    geom_point(aes(colour = factor(Priority))) +
    geom_smooth(method = "loess",
                formula = y ~ x, 
                se = FALSE, 
                colour=finastra_cols("crimson"),
                linetype="dashed",
                size=0.75) +
    xlab("Reporting Period") +
    ylab("Cycle Time (Days)") +
    scale_fill_manual(values=color_point) +
    finastra_theme
```

Column {data-width=600}
-------------------------------------------

### Feature Throughput
```{r feature_throughput_line_plot, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
throughput_df.epics  <- epics %>%   group_by(cldt) %>%  
  summarise(nwi = length(Key),.groups='keep')
ggplot(throughput_df.epics, aes(x=cldt, y=nwi)) +
    geom_line() +
  geom_point(size=2, color="#FF9999") +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm",
                formula = y ~ x, 
                se = FALSE, 
                colour="red", 
                size=1) +
    xlab("Reporting Period") +
    ylab("Number of Work Items") +
    finastra_theme
```

### Story Cycle Time (All)
```{r story_all, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
color_point <- c(finastra_cols("crimson"),
                 finastra_cols("orange"),
                 finastra_cols("fuchsia"),
                 finastra_cols("blue")
                 )
stories_all <- tib %>% filter(! is.na(Closed)) %>% filter(Type == "Story")
ggplot(stories_all, aes(x=cldt, y=cylt)) +
    geom_point(aes(colour = factor(Priority))) +
    geom_smooth(method = "loess",
                formula = y ~ x, 
                se = FALSE, 
                colour=finastra_cols("crimson"),
                linetype="dashed",
                size=0.75) +
    xlab("Reporting Period") +
    ylab("Cycle Time (Days)") +
    scale_fill_manual(values=color_point) +
    finastra_theme  
```


### Story Cycle Time (Critical & High)
```{r story_critical_and_high, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
color_point <- c(finastra_cols("crimson"),
                 finastra_cols("orange"),
                 finastra_cols("fuchsia"),
                 finastra_cols("blue")
                 )
stories_critical_and_high <- tib %>% 
  filter(! is.na(Closed)) %>% filter(Type == "Story") %>%
  filter(Priority == 'Critical' | Priority == 'High' )
ggplot(stories_critical_and_high, aes(x=cldt, y=cylt)) +
    geom_point(aes(colour = factor(Priority))) +
    geom_smooth(method = "loess",
                formula = y ~ x, 
                se = FALSE, 
                colour=finastra_cols("crimson"),
                linetype="dashed",
                size=0.75) +
    xlab("Reporting Period") +
    ylab("Cycle Time (Days)") +
    scale_fill_manual(values=color_point) +
    finastra_theme
```
